patterns: How do you verify a degree?
How do I validate an educational certificate?
How do I know if my degree certificate is valid?
How can I verify my UGC degree?
How can I verify my UGC e certificate?
How can I download my old UGC NET certificate?
responses: A statutory university can award degree specified under Section 22 of UGC Act, 1956, with the due approval of its competent councils and statutory councils
visit facilities.aicte-india.org/dashboard/pages/aicte_nba.php to verify UGC approved colleges
The qualified candidates can download UGC NET certificate from the official portal - ecertificate.nta.ac.in

for queries on Approval of Technical courses :
 University of any kind whether private or government, does not need AICTE approval to run technical courses.

for queries on Approval of medical and Paramedical Cources :
 comes under the purvievv of Medical Council of lndia
